title: Inclusive Digital Learning Framework Design: Online Focus Group Discussion-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Mathematics domain education for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Requires consideration of cultural diversity and multilingual learners

learning_goals: Analyze the three core barriers to building a digital campus through online focus group discussions (O-FGDs).
Derive five core elements to consider when designing a digital learning framework by applying the TOPSIS analysis technique.
Present at least three principles for designing math learning content considering multicultural and multilingual environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
